chain_of_thought_reasoning: To construct the SQL query, I need to identify the user who received the highest bounty amount under a specific vote type (VoteTypeId = 8). First, I will focus on the votes table to filter for the highest BountyAmount where VoteTypeId equals 8. Following that, I'll join the users table to retrieve the DisplayName and WebsiteUrl corresponding to the user with this highest bounty amount. The query will involve aggregating the maximum BountyAmount, followed by a join to obtain the user details associated with that amount.
SQL: SELECT U.DisplayName, U.WebsiteUrl FROM votes V JOIN users U ON V.UserId = U.Id WHERE V.VoteTypeId = 8 AND V.BountyAmount = (SELECT MAX(BountyAmount) FROM votes WHERE VoteTypeId = 8);

WITH MaxBounty AS ( SELECT UserId, MAX(BountyAmount) AS MaxAmount FROM votes WHERE VoteTypeId = 8 GROUP BY UserId ) SELECT U.DisplayName, U.WebsiteUrl FROM votes V JOIN users U ON V.UserId = U.Id JOIN MaxBounty MB ON V.UserId = MB.UserId AND V.BountyAmount = MB.MaxAmount WHERE V.VoteTypeId = 8;

sql_generation.Question: Under the vote type of 8, provide the display names and websites URLs of the user who got the highest bounty amount.
sql_generation.Evidence: vote type of 8 refers to VoteTypeId = 8; the highest bounty amount refers to MAX(BountyAmount);
sql_generation.pred_sql: SELECT U.DisplayName, U.WebsiteUrl FROM votes V JOIN users U ON V.UserId = U.Id WHERE V.VoteTypeId = 8 AND V.BountyAmount = (SELECT MAX(BountyAmount) FROM votes WHERE VoteTypeId = 8);
sql_generation.gold_sql: SELECT DisplayName, WebsiteUrl FROM users WHERE Id = ( SELECT UserId FROM votes WHERE VoteTypeId = 8 ORDER BY BountyAmount DESC LIMIT 1 )

self_reflexion.Question: Under the vote type of 8, provide the display names and websites URLs of the user who got the highest bounty amount.

self_reflexion.gold_sql: SELECT DisplayName, WebsiteUrl FROM users WHERE Id = ( SELECT UserId FROM votes WHERE VoteTypeId = 8 ORDER BY BountyAmount DESC LIMIT 1 )
